shortdesc.ph: The configuration for the raw audio data to be output in the callback.

plentry.pd: The sample rate. You can set this parameter as 8000, 16000, 32000, 44100, or 48000. The default value is 48000.
The number of samples for a channel in a callback. The default value is 1024.
Mono or stereo. The default value is 1.

pd.p: The permission to operate on the audio data. See . The default value is read-only.
The permission to operate on the audio data. Temporarily, you can set this parameter only as Constants.RAW_AUDIO_FRAME_OP_MODE_READ_ONLY.

plentry.pd: The position in the audio pipeline, such as after the recording finishes or before the playback. Temporarily, you can set this parameter only as IAudioFrameObserver.POSITION_RECORD.
